amendment.description: Amendment creates an additional civil penalty on Gulf Coast Oil Spills of more than 1 million barrels, and directs funds derived from such penalties toward previously authorized coastal restoration projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 111-582 to seek to create an additional civil penalty on Gulf Coast Oil Spills of more than 1 million barrels, and would direct those funds toward previously authorized coastal restoration projects.
